card.name: Seclude
card.text: Target player reveals their hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player discards that card. If you don't, put two stun counters on a creature or land they control.

card.name: Veintapped Relic
card.text: Whenever this creature deals excess damage to a permanent, you may draw that many cards. If you do, discard that many cards. {2}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a Splinter token for each card yoyu've discarded this turn. (It's a snow artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add {C}.")

card.name: Hale-Breasted Phoenix
card.text: Flying, lifelink Scavenge {4}{R}{W} ({4}{R}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.) When a creature scavenges this card, put it into your hand. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Twinhaft Challenger
card.text: Menace Whenever a battle you control is defeated or an attacking creature you control dies, the defending player loses 1 life.

card.name: Looming Sentinels
card.text: Menace When this creature enters, create an Encounter token. (It's a colorless battle with 2 defense and "When this is defeated, draw a card and create a Treasure token.")

card.name: Drifter in Distress
card.text: Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, gain 1 life, then you may put a stun counter on it. If you do, that player discards a card. {2}{B}, Discard a card: This creature can't be blocked except by Horrors this turn.

card.name: Lord of the Labyrinths
card.text: Menace, deathtouch Whenever a creature blocks a creature you control, the blocking creature's controller loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. {2}{R}: Target Minotaur must be blocked this turn if able.

card.name: Glacial Wanderings
card.text: At end of combat on each player's turn, that player loses 1 life for each untapped creature they control. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may put a stun counter on it. If you do, each player discards a card, then you draw a card.

card.name: Hypothermia
card.text: Exile target creature. You gain life equal to its toughness. When this card is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library, then each player loses 1 life.

card.name: Glacial Fracture
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap an untapped creature you control and put a stun counter on it. Choose one — • Glacial Fracture deals damage equal to the tapped creature's power to any target. • Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Bitter Chill Bravery
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. If {S} was spent to cast this spell, put three +1/+1 counters on that creature instead. ({S} is mana from a snow source.)

card.name: Gone Astray
card.text: When this enchantment enters, target nonland permanent an opponent controls phases out until this enchantment leaves the battlefield. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist.)

card.name: Snowstorm Searcher
card.text: Tapped creatures you control have ward {1}. (Tapping a creature doesn't cause ward to trigger on anything already targeting it.) {1}{W}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+0 gains lifelink until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
